summary: Most requested Product form and backend changes appear implemented: fixed category/size constants, product name converted to a dropdown via PRODUCT_NAMES, HPP added to frontend submission and backend Product/addProduct, and a migration module wired into the actor upgrade path. One notable unrequested backend model change (InventoryItem minimumStock) is present in the diff excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend InventoryItem model updated to include a new minimumStock field (unrelated to Product dropdown/HPP work).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to Product form dropdown options, HPP field, and optional product migration. No request mentions adding/changing inventory minimum stock fields.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated) // "Updated InventoryItem model with minimumStock field" and InventoryItem type includes minimumStock : Nat
